title: Solomon’s Prayer of Dedication
summary: Solomon stands before the people and prays a heartfelt prayer at the dedication of the temple. He asks God to hear prayers made at the temple, forgive sins, and show mercy to His people in times of trouble.

faq.question: What was the main focus of Solomon’s prayer?
faq.answer: He asked God to hear the prayers of the people and to forgive them when they repented.

faq.question: Why was the temple so important in Solomon’s prayer?
faq.answer: It represented God’s presence and was to be a place where people could seek His face.
